name: Let Yourself Out, Eddie Kaspbrak!
description:
Alternatively Titled: HAPPY NEW YEARS, EDDIE KASPBRAK (A SERIES OF CONVERSATIONS OF VARYING QUALITY)

This isn't really a sequel, more like... an epilogue? Coda? Encore? Farewell?
Most likely you should have played Outside Voice first: https://mapurl.itch.io/use-your-outside-voice.

I hope you enjoy it.

ARROW KEYS to move. SPACEBAR or RETURN/ENTER to interact. Game length is about 15-25 minutes.

Available embedded in the browser, or as a download. Note that the browser based version DOES NOT support mobile and may not work properly on devices like an iPad (AUDIO NOT WORKING, etc). You will probably need a keyboard. NOTE: MOUSE INPUT MAY NOT WORK PROPERLY ON BROWSER. PLEASE USE ARROW KEYS/ENTER KEY TO NAVIGATE THE MAIN MENU IF SO.

As always, this game is free but consider donating to a mutual fund if you enjoyed it: https://mutualaid.carrd.co/.

Content warnings: mentions of alcohol, past trauma.
